content.html: Terrifying development in Russia for LGBTQ+ people this morning. Vladimir Putin has signed a new law effectively outlawing "public expression of LGBTQ+ behavior." Texas is considering similar laws targeted at transgender people in the United States with HB708.
content.value:
Terrifying development in Russia for LGBTQ+ people this morning. Vladimir Putin has signed a new law effectively outlawing "public expression of LGBTQ+ behavior."

Texas is considering similar laws targeted at transgender people in the United States with HB708.
